img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 82.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c3/Wukong_LowerHollow_82.jpg)
At this point, her eyes will start to glow, signifying her second phase. Things will get very scary if her eyes start to glow even brighter and mesmerize you.
img_below_text:
If this happens, you'll suddenly be transported to an illusory realm where you're on a bed of webs instead of solid ground. This can get extremely bad as the more you move around, the more you'll be slowed until eventually you'll be exposed as you try and break free of the webbing.
Expect the Violet Spider to absolutely take advantage of your vulnerability in these moments, attacking with both her talons and a large jump slam attack that even staggers her for a bit. You'll need to stand your ground and use Rock Solid to knock away her blasts if you're unable to dodge them in time.

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 80 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 82.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c3/Wukong_LowerHollow_82.jpg)
At this point, her eyes will start to glow, signifying her second phase. Things will get very scary if her eyes start to glow even brighter and mesmerize you."
            - Following Text: "If this happens, you'll suddenly be transported to an illusory realm where you're on a bed of webs instead of solid ground. This can get extremely bad as the more you move around, the more you'll be slowed until eventually you'll be exposed as you try and break free of the webbing.
Expect the Violet Spider to absolutely take advantage of your vulnerability in these moments, attacking with both her talons and a large jump slam attack that even staggers her for a bit. You'll need to stand your ground and use Rock Solid to knock away her blasts if you're unable to dodge them in time."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a tense moment in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character faces off against the Violet Spider, a formidable enemy. The scene is set in an illusory realm, characterized by a webbed floor, which slows the player down as they move. The Violet Spider is in its second phase, indicated by its glowing eyes, and is poised to exploit the player's vulnerability with aggressive attacks, including talon strikes and a jump slam. The player must strategically use defensive abilities like Rock Solid to counter the spider's assaults and survive the encounter.
